programme.desc: The latest news, sport, business and weather from the BBC's Breakfast team. [S] Including regional news at 25 and 55 minutes past each hour.
programme.title: Breakfast

programme.desc: 7/10. Catching up with previous Wanted Down Under families. When last on the show, Wayne and Jo-Anne Manuel seemed set on a move to Perth. But what happened next?
programme.title: Wanted Down Under Revisited

programme.desc: Martin Roberts and Lucy Alexander visit properties in Derby, Surrey and Cheshire. [S] Followed by BBC News; Weather.

programme.desc: Property series. Ed Hall and Kristian Digby help a couple who have been looking for the perfect new home for over a year to find something special on the charming Kent coastline.
programme.title: To Buy or Not to Buy

programme.desc: Jane and George Edmonds hope to raise 1,000 pounds to treat George to his ultimate dream. [S] Followed by BBC News; Weather.
programme.title: Cash in the Attic

programme.desc: Antiques challenge. Kate Bliss and Thomas Plant help the teams at the Alexandra Palace antiques fair, while Tim Wonnacott admires some elegant wooden carvings at Petworth House.
programme.title: Bargain Hunt

programme.desc: Wrong Number: Drama series about a crime-solving medic. A kidnapper mistakenly calls Dr Sloan, demanding a ransom for somebody's son. Can Mark and Steve crack the kidnappers' code in time?

programme.desc: The latest national and international news stories from the BBC News team. [S] Followed by Regional News and Weather.

programme.desc: CBeebies. 5/40. Arts and crafts. Mister Maker makes a surprising picture, creates a wobbly clown in under a minute and shows how to make a brilliant bubble wrap cactus that never needs watering.

programme.title: Thumb Wrestling Federation

programme.desc: CBBC. Nevquest: Comedy series. Melanie appears before Nev in a dream as a Fairy Godmother, and before long Nev and Crazy Keith are on a quest to free the magical, wintry land of Nevia.
programme.title: Bear Behaving Badly

programme.title: Hotel Trubble

programme.desc: CBBC. CBBC's Sorcerer's Apprentice reveals the secrets behind some of his magic tricks. Helen has a go at karate. Andy and Helen brave the elements to race each other on husky rigs.
programme.title: Blue Peter

programme.desc: CBBC. Conor's Little Sister: Children from across the UK talk about their interests and passions. Conor explains the pain his younger sister, seven-year-old Alice, injects into his world.

programme.desc: CBBC. Daily news magazine keeping young viewers up to date on the latest stories and events happening at home and abroad.

programme.desc: BBC One joins the BBC's rolling news channel for a night of news, with bulletins on the hour and the headlines every 15 minutes.
